theme: Educational, friendly, modern, approachable for students - clean and engaging interface that feels safe and welcoming
target_audience: Students from middle school to university level who want to practice communication skills

primary.usage: Primary CTAs, active states, key interactive elements, chat send buttons

secondary.usage: Secondary actions, links, info indicators, educational content highlights

accent.usage: Achievements, gamification elements, special features, AI responses

icon_system.approach: Inline SVG via data-lucide attributes for flexibility and easy styling
icon_system.color_usage: Inherit from parent text color or use theme colors for semantic meaning

when_to_skip: Main chat interface - use icons and clean UI instead
Action buttons - rely on icons and text
User profile areas - use avatar placeholders with initials
Dashboard widgets - data visualizations and icons preferred
style_preferences: Friendly illustration style with diverse student representation
Clean, minimalist aesthetic that doesn't distract from learning
Warm, welcoming color palette matching teal/blue/violet scheme
Professional quality appropriate for educational context

imagery.prompt_template: [Subject: diverse students engaged in learning/chatting], clean modern illustration style, educational and friendly, teal #14b8a6 and blue #3b82f6 color palette, welcoming atmosphere, [aspect ratio], professional educational quality, inclusive representation

spacing.container_max_width: 1280px (max-w-7xl) for main content, 896px (max-w-4xl) for chat interface

glassmorphism.usage: Chat message containers, sidebar panels, modal overlays, floating action elements

design_rationale.color_choices: Teal (#14b8a6) chosen as primary for its educational, growth-oriented associations while remaining modern and friendly. Blue (#3b82f6) provides trust and calm - critical for learning environments. Violet (#8b5cf6) adds engaging, creative energy for AI interactions and gamification. This palette balances professional credibility (Khan Academy influence) with modern, engaging aesthetics (Discord influence).
design_rationale.typography_choice: Inter selected for exceptional readability across all sizes, crucial for students spending extended time reading chat messages. Its modern, friendly aesthetic strikes perfect balance between professional and approachable. Wide range of weights enables clear hierarchy in chat interfaces.
design_rationale.icon_strategy: Lucide provides comprehensive chat-focused icons (message bubbles, send, user profiles) with consistent stroke-based style. Perfect for web-app context where icons communicate actions quickly. Emphasis on communication, learning, and user management icons aligns with student chat AI functionality.
design_rationale.imagery_approach: Web-app focused prototype prioritizes clean UI with minimal imagery. Icons handle most visual communication. When images are needed (onboarding, empty states), they should feature diverse students in friendly illustration style, reinforcing safe and inclusive learning environment. No decorative images in main chat interface to maintain focus.
design_rationale.effects_rationale: Glassmorphism creates modern, lightweight feel for chat bubbles and panels - inspired by Discord's contemporary aesthetic but with educational restraint. Soft shadows provide depth without distraction. Rounded corners throughout (rounded-lg, rounded-xl, rounded-2xl) create approachable, friendly feeling essential for student comfort. Smooth transitions enhance polish without compromising performance.
